game.name: GTFO
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: GTFO는 하드코어 협동 호러 슈팅 게임으로, 손에 땀을 쥐게 하는 서스펜스와 심장을 뛰게 하는 폭발적인 액션을 경험할 수 있습니다. 이 치명적인 지하 감옥에서 살아남으려면 은신, 전략, 팀워크를 총동원해야 합니다. 함께 협력하지 못하면, 함께 죽고 말 겁니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: GTFO is a hardcore cooperative horror shooter that throws you from gripping suspense to explosive action in a heartbeat. Stealth, strategy, and teamwork are necessary to survive in your deadly, underground prison. Work together or die together.

reviewHighlights.text: Dead game, it WAS good but nowadays you're only going to find the most insufferable try hard elitists or people who buy the game on sale and are gone...
You explore dungeons full of evil throbbers, Where you and your squad are the robbers. Strange artefacts want to be collected, So that weird boosts ca...
